page.title: 15A Day in the Life of Ruth
page.content: When I woke up at 7.30a.m. I thought it was going to rain. I had my breakfast of cornflakes and I got dressed at 8.0 and went to school. The whistle went at 8.56. We went into Assembly and Mr. Withington read us a story. In the classroom we had a lesson about tesselations. Then we had playtime and I had a game of marbles. Then we came in to do our creative writing. We had to write about an old person who had an accident. When we had activities I chose collage boxes to make pictures, and the phonic group had phonics. We had a quiz next and then a story. When we went home I had my tea and at 6.30p.m. I went to inter club and played rounders. I went home and watched T.V. until I went to bed at 9.0p.m.
